title: Boolean Logic: not
description: In this problem, you are given two boolean logic blocks to solve. Read through each block in the program and decide whether the result for each is true or false. Then drop the true or false output block below the logic problem to show your solution to that problem. Once you have solved both logic problems, run your program and check your answer.
hint: There are two boolean logic expressions written into the program, not true and not false. Your job is to determine if each of those expressions is true or false. If you have answered both in the code, run your code and check to see if you got it correct. Remember, the keyword not swaps the value of a boolean value.
